column4: being the noob i am, im going to ask another noobish question: i want to backup some files on my windows box (on the laptop), couldnt i just transfer the files to this desktop machine? and if so how do i do that in linux?
i did that, but will it show in Computer > Disks
you can make a link to /mnt/windows
at lest your willing to learn
when its mounted in /mnt/windows it ant going to show up that partion as a disk linux wont do that
so you have to make a ln to some dir you controle so you can have heaser acces to it
do you have all the difernt repos enabled
not follow the http://ubuntuguide.org for set up
